textContent:
If you've opened this right now, I hope you know it already, but in case you're looking for a reminder, let me spell it out for you ðŸ‘€

Loving you isn't just a feeling. It's something my heart naturally settles into....effortless, constant, and real. ðŸ¤§

There are moments I catch myself smiling at the thought of you. Not because of something you did, but simply because you exist. Your presence, even from miles away, has this quiet magic that calms every storm inside me. ðŸ¤§
And your voice? God, don’t even get me started. It stays with me. Whether you're calm, excited, teasing me, or half-asleep—each version of it hits differently. Like, I could recognize your mood just from the way you say hello. Sometimes I replay your voice notes just to feel closer to you. It’s crazy how comforting and addictive it is at the same time. ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·ðŸ˜­

And your eyes—those brown eyes. There’s just something about them. They’re warm, intense, and honestly way too pretty for someone who has no idea what kind of effect they have on me.ðŸ˜­ðŸ©·

Sometimes I sit still, trying to grasp how someone so far away can feel closer than anyone else. Your love, your way of loving is warmer than any touch. It’s the kind of love that makes me believe in soul connections, in timing, in prayers that somehow get answered just right. ðŸ¥º

I love you not just for the way you make me feel, but for who you are. For how you listen. For how you care without needing a reason. For how you’ve quietly become a part of every tomorrow I look forward to. ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·

You are my calm, my chaos, my comfort, my craving all wrapped in one. ðŸ˜­ðŸ©·
So whenever you question it, make sure to read this letter and remember: 

You are loved more deeply than these words can ever capture. ðŸ©·

Always yours,
Suvi ðŸ¥º
